constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARSON:
H.R. 3019.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H2152]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: COVID–19 Memorial Quilt Act of 2021
